entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 24 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
